author: ijjk
message:
Update workflows for nextjs-bot (#81134)

This updates to use the new bot account specific for Next.js which we've
already been using for stale issues for a bit.

files.patch:
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@ jobs:
 
       - name: Set Git author
         run: |
-          git config user.name "vercel-release-bot"
+          git config user.name "nextjs-bot"
           git config user.email "infra+release@vercel.com"
 
       - name: Setup node
